title: df is happening
body: i tried to patch the client, but instead it got error and now i can't patch it anymore, i can't even log in it is stuck at "Authenticating"

replies.body: Your connection seems to be getting blocked from our authentication server.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings to see if that helps.  Check your anti virus settings as well, and try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear out any snags.
